nature_language: [当前位置北京,目标位置深圳,旅行人数4,旅行天数4] 从北京飞去深圳探亲，顺便玩4天。我和老婆带着两个孩子一起，孩子们想去白石龙音乐主题公园，预算1.5万元，请做下行程安排
nature_language_en: [Current location: Beijing, Destination: Shenzhen, Number of travelers: 4, Travel days: 4] Traveling from Beijing to Shenzhen to visit relatives and spend 4 days having fun. My wife and I are bringing our two children, who want to visit the Baishilong Music Theme Park. Our budget is 15,000 RMB. Please help us plan the itinerary.
